headline: Accenture Acquires Decho to Further Scale Palantir and Gen AI Capabilities Across Health and Public Service Clients
summary: LONDON, October 14, 2025--Accenture has acquired Decho, a UK-based technology and AI consultancy.

content.title: Accenture Acquires Decho to Further Scale Palantir and Gen AI Capabilities Across Health and Public Service Clients
content.summary: LONDON, October 14, 2025--Accenture has acquired Decho, a UK-based technology and AI consultancy.

thumbnail.caption: Accenture has acquired Decho, a UK-based technology and AI consultancy that helps organizations reinvent through the design, delivery and scaling of Palantir solutions.

headline: Appian Announces 2025 APJ Partner Award Winners
summary: Appian (Nasdaq: APPN) has today announced the recipients of its 2025 Asia-Pacific and Japan (APJ) Partner Awards, recognising excellence across five different categories. The awards honour high-performing partners who have driven significant growth in customer engagements and delivered transformational value through the Appian Platform. This year's recipients have built world-class solutions and services spanning multiple industries, reinforcing another successful year for Appian's partner ecosy

content.title: Appian Announces 2025 APJ Partner Award Winners
content.summary: Appian (Nasdaq: APPN) has today announced the recipients of its 2025 Asia-Pacific and Japan (APJ) Partner Awards, recognising excellence across five different categories. The awards honour high-performing partners who have driven significant growth in customer engagements and delivered transformational value through the Appian Platform. This year's recipients have built world-class solutions and services spanning multiple industries, reinforcing another successful year for Appian's partner ecosy
